devi_stotras.name: Durga Saptashati (Devi Mahatmyam)
devi_stotras.description: A sacred scripture describing the victories of Goddess Durga over various demons such as Mahishasura, Shumbha, and Nishumbha.
benefits: Removes fear, suffering, and negative influences
Gives strength, courage, and divine protection
devi_stotras.key_excerpt: या देवी सर्वभूतेषु शक्ति-रूपेण संस्थिता । नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमो नमः ॥

devi_stotras.name: Lalitha Sahasranama
devi_stotras.description: 1000 names of Goddess Lalitha Tripura Sundari describing her divine form, qualities, and cosmic presence.
devi_stotras.key_excerpt: श्री माताऽ श्री महाराज्ञी श्रीमत् सिम्हासनेश्वरी ।
devi_stotras.notes: Considered a very sacred text in Sri Vidya tradition.

devi_stotras.name: Durga Kavacham
devi_stotras.description: A powerful armor prayer invoking Devi Durga for protection from worldly and spiritual dangers.
devi_stotras.key_excerpt: त्रैलोक्य मोहनं हि एतत् कवचं परमाद्भुतम् ।

devi_stotras.name: Kanakadhara Stotram
devi_stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
devi_stotras.description: A hymn to Goddess Lakshmi composed by Adi Shankaracharya to bless a poor woman with prosperity.
devi_stotras.key_excerpt: अङ्गं हरेः पुलकभूष्णम् आश्रितम् हृद्या कदम्बं शिशिरम् कटाक्षम् ।

devi_stotras.name: Mahishasura Mardini Stotram (Aigiri Nandini)
devi_stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
devi_stotras.description: A powerful hymn describing the victory of Goddess Durga over Mahishasura, filled with rhythmic and energetic verses.
devi_stotras.key_excerpt: ऐगिरी नन्दिनी नन्दित मदिनी विश्व विनोदिनि नन्दनोते ।

devi_stotras.name: Devi Aparadha Kshamapana Stotram
devi_stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
devi_stotras.description: A heartfelt prayer apologizing to the Goddess for errors committed knowingly or unknowingly.
devi_stotras.key_excerpt: आपत्सु मग्नः स्मरणं त्वदीयं कर्तुं न शक्ता गतिम् अन्यमार्गम् ।

devi_stotras.name: Annapurna Stotram
devi_stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
devi_stotras.description: A hymn to Goddess Annapurna, the giver of nourishment and spiritual fulfillment.

devi_stotras.name: Lakshmi Ashtottara Shatanamavali
devi_stotras.description: 108 names of Goddess Lakshmi describing her divine attributes.

devi_stotras.name: Meenakshi Pancharatnam
devi_stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
devi_stotras.description: A five-verse hymn praising Goddess Meenakshi of Madurai for her beauty and power.

devi_stotras.name: Saraswati Stotram
devi_stotras.description: Hymns dedicated to Goddess Saraswati, the deity of learning and arts.
